column5: My place is close to family-friendly activities for tubing/kayak the Frio River. Frio River is only 1 mile from the house. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the outdoors space and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, families (with kids), and big groups. Garner State park is only 8 miles.
